===================================================================================
convert - Functions to convert between low-level types (binary, hex, ascii and int)
===================================================================================
This module provides general low-level conversion functions such as:

  - ascii -> binary
  - ascii -> hexidecimal
  - ascii -> integer
  - integer -> ascii
  - integer -> binary
  - integer -> hexidecimal
  - etc.

.. automodule:: convert
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :private-members:
    :special-members:
    :exclude-members: __dict__, __module__, __weakref__
